website_summaries.verdict: Multi-compartments in a bag for two racquets, carried ninja style.
pros: Plenty of room in this bag, which has an insulated pocket for drinks or snacks
Separate zippered shoe compartment plus four small zippered compartments on the sides
We love how one is fleece lined for your sunglasses
The "samurai sword" racquet style storage stops your head from hitting your racquet handle when you carry it, especially coveted by those who ride a bicycle to the courts
cons: Shoe compartment is accessible only from the bottom of the bag

customer_reviews.title: Location of shoe compartment is frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: Construction of the bag seems to be fine. However, the location of the shoe compartment makes the bag unusable in my opinion. The zipper for the compartment is on the bottom of the bag. So, in order to get to the compartment you have to lay the bag on it's back. Additionally, if you have much in the main compartment of the bag, it's difficult to put shoes into the shoe compartment. The smaller compartments are helpful, I suppose, but none of them are really larger enough. The insulated compartments are a good idea, but not really big enough for a water bottle. All in all, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bombadil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Pickleball too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a pickleball bag after seeing a similar one at a tournament we were in. It is perfect for paddles/balls/shoes and water bottles. The side pockets work great for car keys and glasses and there is a great insulated pocket to keep your water cold. Great Design!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cook

customer_reviews.title: can carry 3 tennis rackets!
customer_reviews.text: bought this a few days ago and so far love it. I bought the blue/white one and the colors look exactly like in the product picture. I particularly like that 3 midplus sized tennis rackets fit in this backpack comfortably. Most other backpacks can really just fit 2. The only downside is the packing and shipping of the product. It's shipped completely pressed and collapsed. The backpack was all wrinkled up and the edge of the top opening was bent badly. I had to stuff it with a lot of cloth for 2 days for its shape to look good.
customer_reviews.author: RainAndSun

customer_reviews.title: I honestly love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis bag. I'm an organization nerd and I wanted a backpack style tennis bag. This one offers plenty of varied-size compartments to properly separate my gear in my own, perfect, obsessive-compulsive manner. One of the upper, side compartments is soft-lined for your cell phone. There is a ton of space in the main compartment. I'm not a big fan of the shoe compartment in the back because it is accessible only from the bottom of the bag. Exterior quality is excellent. Zipper quality is excellent. That's where most bags eventually fail.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Large, convenient bag
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is convenient and large. While it can carry your shoes, I usually leave them out so I can fit more things inside the bag. I typically carry shirt, shorts, socks, long athletic pants, long sleeve top, mid sized blue tooth speaker, 2 - 3 cans of balls and both racquets. I still have room even with all these items inside. The racquet compartments are convenient and make it easy to carry. This was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: Has a space for everything. Separate compartments for two rackets mean they don't bump against each other and give you this ninja warrior loook when walking around. Really like how it stands up by itself and the main compartment has space for tons of gear. Zips are great but need to be careful the zip is aligned with the toggle when opening as the toggle can get sideways to the zip. Refrigerated compartment is great but not huge.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy

customer_reviews.title: great - but no water bottle pocket...
customer_reviews.text: We loved the bag (it's for our son), and he did, too. It's extremely roomy - fits both rackets very comfortably, and has many pockets for all your gear, including the shoe tunnel. All good - except they missed a pocket for a bottle! Seems silly, and a quick edit would fix it: turn that front FILA logo'd spot into a bottle pocket! But in any case - minor issue that we solved with a carabiner clip. Otherwise great, and looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!  Very good tennis bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tennis bag for a reasonable price (if you like this type of bag). Quality and construction is good; adequate storage compartments. I expect it'll take a beating but we'll see. My Fila bag of the same configuration lasted several years (playing 5 days a week). "Comfort" not rated because it don't think it's a factor.
customer_reviews.author: ELB

customer_reviews.title: Great Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: While I've only had it for a month or two, I really like this bag. The shoe compartment is nice, along with the insulated pocket for a drink or maybe even my iPhone on a hot day in the sun. I like the way the rackets are positioned. And the colors are great. Can't speak to durability, but so far so food.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect the zipper to last.
customer_reviews.text: One of the zippers on the back, to hold in a tennis racket, broke about three weeks after using the back. Once my husband told me, and I logged in to Amazon to see about returning, I found out that my 30 days to return the bag had already ended. So he's now stuck with a bag that he can only carry around one racket in, which was not his purpose in buying THIS particular bag. I get that I missed the return window, but the zipper should have lasted longer than 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Zipper Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag. I ride my bike to tennis and it was perfect - comfortable to wear, and fit all my gear. So, when the racquet compartment zipper broke on the first one after about 3 weeks, I returned it for replacement - no problem. Now, the same zipper on the second one broke after 8 weeks, with me being very careful with it. BTW, I use a Head Intelligence iS12 with a 115 sq. in head size. I can't really see how people are saying they get 3 racquets in this bag. I could not get my 1 racquet in with the cover on. I would not recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: mswring

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the zipper on one of the raquet pouches broken, rendering it unable to carry the raquet without it falling sideways. I had already taken the tag off, and cant be bothered with the hassle of the return.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after second use, but Amazon's return policy was great and we received a replacement quickly. The second one has been in use everyday for about two months now and taking quite a beating as it goes to high school tennis with my teenager, and it's holding up well. It looks sporty and clean. My teenager likes the fact that she looks like a ninja carrying two swords with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rinrin

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable the bag is to use and carry. Overall loving it. The one very annoying thing is the design of the zipper handles. It always gets stuck in an awkward position because of the shape of the zipper handle. The zipper itself runs very smoothly... just the annoying thing with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag! Get the protection plan!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tennis bag! I can’t find another bag that matches it’s versatility with all the pockets, clothing compartment, and shoe compartment. My only issue with it is that the shoe compartment zipper broke after a year and a half of moderate use. I play about 3 times per week. Knocking a star off for that. I bought another one with a $10 protection plan, which I recommend. That should cover it for 4 years so it’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I picked two of these bags up for pickleball and they are perfect for this purpose. Paddles fit perfectly in the racquet compartment and my shoes fit nicely in the shoe compartment. Even after all those items there is still plenty of space for everything else that you might need.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my tennis bag. It is very roomy and I love the way two rackets fit in separately with cushion in between them. Also love the pockets on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this bag
customer_reviews.text: Such poor quality - zipper holding racquet split right away, within a week, then broke entirely a few weeks later. Almost impossible to get shoes in shoe compartment and I wear a small size, racquets coming out two sides insures you will not be able to get through doors, carry it on a plane, or take it anyplace without running into something or knocking into someone or something. Horrible, horrible, horrible. Will never buy anything with Fila name on it as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Naylon

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious tennis bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked great for my son. He loved the room he had for all of his stuff! It worked really well for tennis season. Only downside was a zipper broke halfway through the season, I'm sure from all the use, but still wish it had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Racket handles in the Deadpool arrangement!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who is an avid tenis player, loves the orientation of the rackets. The additional pockets are excellent as well. Great for a variety of common uses.
customer_reviews.author: Andy And Mandy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great two racquet bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the backpack bag that handles two racquets and has a ton of space for balls, drinks, towels and side pockets for the small stuff. I ride my bike to the courts with this bag loaded and it is comfortable and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great. but could be longer.
customer_reviews.text: FILA products are pretty good. I was please with the material quality. I got it for the gym since I walk a lot I wanted a backpack instead of the classic gym bag. Most importantly was the shoe compartment. My only complaint is the bag is limited with the shoe compartment size. I got big feet size 10. So it takes up a lot of room for the clothing. Its snug but should be a little larger lengthwise.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: zippers are CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for 2 years and both zippers for the tennis racquets have broken -plain junk. The rest of the bag i like very much but the lack of quality in the zippers is why I will never recommend
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Not too small or large!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for tennis. I put my racket on one side and both of my kids on the other. Ample enough space for all other gear but not overly huge at the same time. Only drawback was that it had a strong plastic smell when I got it. But that was remedied with a box of baking soda and newspaper and leaving outside in shop for a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack style bag.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag. Seems to be well made and holds a surprising amount of stuff. Fits two racquets easily. I like that they go out to the sides instead of right behind your head. The insulated pocket is too small to be useful for food or drinks. All in all, happy with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey c.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. I use it for pickleball
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I use it for pickleball. Can easily hold two paddles, a pair of shoes, a change of clothes, and my keys, wallet, and cellphone, plus there's an insulated pocket that can hold two sports drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great great bag. Good for two-three racquets and a lot more space for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jaffery

customer_reviews.title: Stylin!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet. It looks gorgeous and very practical with all the compartments. Very stylin! Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amyzon

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Lightweight, and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag. Has a spot for everything! This bag holds it all. My daughter is super picky when it comes to tennis bags and this one is by far her favorite! She had me buy an extra just in case something happens to her current bag. And she gets compliments on her bag all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TTownLArry

customer_reviews.title: Very good bag with lots of pockets and perfect for pickleball
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag with lots of pockets and perfect for pickleball. I can carry 4 paddles and my shoes extra clothes and balls as well as cooker for 3 waters and more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage looks nice.. Paddles fit Only issue wish side pockets a tad bigger
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son plays. He is loving the bag & that all is together in 1 spot! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JdsC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is great! I would have given it 5 stars but the zippers are sketchy, they often stick but they do work. Everything else is perfect. Cleans up easily, even from clay court dust.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broken
customer_reviews.text: Zipper was broken but since I didn’t use it until recently, I can’t return it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis bag. Fits everything I need. Love the insulated pocket. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Hibachi

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It replaced my twenty year old over the shoulder style bag. I now can carry my racquets, clothes, water bottle, and all other accessories with ease. It feels great on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets for lots of stuff. Very roomy. One small insulated pockets. I really like the pocket on bottom for shoes. Have had this for a few months and seems to be holding up well so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable bag
customer_reviews.text: I like how much space is in it. My husband and I share this bag together for our pickleball paddles, balls, towels, sunscreen, keys, phones, etc.
customer_reviews.author: scarlet warner

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous value
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Ample room for racquets, shoes and anything else you need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Demaio

customer_reviews.title: Great for pickleball
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my husband for all his Pickleball gear. He loves it! It is the perfect size to hold a couple of racquets, shoes, water, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It fits so much. Perfect for ALL tennis players and it looks ”cool.”
customer_reviews.author: Josh U Michiana

customer_reviews.title: Look for updated bag
customer_reviews.text: It is a good tennis bag, quite spacious but overall quality is not great. The zipper handles seem as they will break anytime soon if not handled carefully. I ordered this by mistake, look for updated one as it might be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis lover

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and am very happy with this bag. I'm someone that likes lots of pockets to keep things sorted - this bag has been great.
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. The shoe area a little small but works. The main area works great for my pickleball paddles and shoe. The side pockets could be a little bigger. But is nice they have a lot of pockets. A very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Rex A Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Both zippers that hold rackets broke. One within 2 months and the other 2 months later Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gary Kasson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not Designed to carry a size 10.5 shoe with anything else. storage compartment for cloths gets filled with shoes.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis bag.
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis bag I've ever owned. Lots of compartments. Plenty of room but not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tennis
customer_reviews.text: Used for tennis. Material is tough and is big enough for all the gear.
customer_reviews.author: NormR.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this tennis bag! It is great looking and holds a ton! It has held up very well with lots of use and abuse. Many useful compartments for a variety of items.
customer_reviews.author: jill_e_h

customer_reviews.title: excellente!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it!!!! very nice choice for the price it seem expensive, very good quality
customer_reviews.author: maria e.

customer_reviews.title: there is no water bottle holder
customer_reviews.text: I was out of town and there is only a 30 day return policy. My bad. It's never been used. Make sure you read the fine print. Bulky with no holder for water.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Trichler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Apparently bag was drug behind a car before being shipped to us. Bag smells horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rapt with this bag, well designed, some nice extras, comfortable on the shoulders, good design for 2 racquets!!
customer_reviews.author: wossa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of compartments, the two racquets are separated by partition
customer_reviews.author: kirk iliev

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and practical backpack for scooter transportation. Very large despite the external dimensions. Excellent purchase. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: paolo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Very useful and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Very useful and nice looking! I use it for pickleball. Plenty of room for paddles, shoes, balls, water bottles, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag. High quality, i can fit everything including a towel and a spare shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel from Argentina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on the tennis racquet slot broker after three months. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag as it fits my tennis gear and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag as it fits my tennis gear and clothes well and shoes. Also comfortable to carry. Great Bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I like this tennis backpack a lot!!
customer_reviews.text: I like having a lot of room for my tennis rackets an all that I need to carry for tennis!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag has plenty of room for all my pickleball equipment especially when traveling to tournaments. Would definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack...holds everything I need, looks great, seems to be high quality
customer_reviews.author: AustinTx01

customer_reviews.title: it is great and so much lighter to carry than my last ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but the side locket that is a cooler only fits smaller water bottles. Otherwise, it is great and so much lighter to carry than my last bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great back with plenty of pockets. Is fraying some are two bottom pockets
customer_reviews.author: terry greene

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but shoes can be difficult to get in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but shoes can be difficult to get in and out of their compartment. Wouldn’t buy another. Use for racquetball.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Cover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are a pickleball player, this is the bag for you. Roomy, quality construction and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: jorge ferreiro

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it !
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! Its quality is really nice and it can hold so many things. THANKS FILA!
customer_reviews.author: cansu

customer_reviews.title: Great Pickleball Bag
customer_reviews.text: Easily accomodates two paddles in separate pockets as well as all of your pickleball gear.
customer_reviews.author: RPH

customer_reviews.title: So practical, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had a tennis tournament in another state and this was a godsend. Held all my stuff and was the best carry on. Love the shoe carrier at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Audraz

customer_reviews.title: I bought this backpack for my daughter. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my daughter. She loves it! It holds all her tennis gear with plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a new bag for his tennis gear and this fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has so much room and compartments that I can keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag the cold section work well the reason I bought this tennis bag.
customer_reviews.author: uncle sam

customer_reviews.title: Way darker
customer_reviews.text: It is way smaller and darker than i expected but it will work for what i need it to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Has everything you need if you travel light to play tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fila makes an awesome bag for my pickleball gear.
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this bag is. Lots of room and many pockets to work with.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. I like it . Very unique from others
customer_reviews.author: Erik H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This truly is an awesome bag and everyone wants to know where I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This truly is an awesome bag and everyone wants to know where I bought it. However the zipper for one of the racket compartments is broken after just a few months of usage .I would not recommend this product to anyone until the company decides to put the same zippers on all parts of the bag instead of using cheap plastic one's where the rackets are stored.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had a Wilson with cooler pocket for 2 16 oz Gatorade bottles and loved it. This one is very similar and I love it. This is the only one I could find with a cooler pocket plus large capacity and 2 racquets​.
customer_reviews.author: Bob from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers on racket pockets
customer_reviews.text: right racket holding pocket zipper broke first time I used it. Because it sat for a month before I used it Amazon would not take it back. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: We just started to use this. Got it as ...
customer_reviews.text: We just started to use this. Got it as a xmas gift for my son. He started using it one week ago for tennis and the zipper broke. I'm more upset that I can't find a phone # to contact amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zippers
customer_reviews.text: The zipper for one of the racquet compartments is broken after just two months of usage. I would not recommend this product to anyone and I'm sorry I purchased this tennis bag.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

product_meta.title: Fila Ultimate Tennis with Shoe Pocket, Black/Grey, One Size
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:Black/GreyStay ahead of the game with all your equipment in the Fila Ultimate Tennis Backpack. Features include dual tennis racket sleeves, a spacious main compartment and a shoe compartment.
